SELECT memberId, userId,factionId, (SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question_answer where userId = m.userId and DATE_FORMAT(createTime, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m') and factionId = m.factionId) answerNum, (SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question_comment where userId = m.userId and DATE_FORMAT(createTime, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m') and factionId = m.factionId) discussNum, (SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question_answer where userId = m.userId and DATE_FORMAT(createTime, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m') and isAccept = '1' and factionId = m.factionId) adoptNum FROM bb_question_faction_member m WHERE and m.status = '2' and factionId = #{factionId}

select count(*) from (SELECT id,(SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question_answer where parentId != '' and parentId = a.id) plcnt, (SELECT count(likeId) FROM bb_question_like where id = a.id) likecnt FROM bb_question_answer a WHERE parentId = '' and userId = #{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT(createTime, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m') AND factionId = #{factionId} ) b where b.plcnt >2 and b.likecnt >6;
